00023 #define SafeCloseHandle( x )    { if ( x ) { CloseHandle( x ); x = 0; } }

00029 static WSADATA _wsaData;
00030 static SOCKET _clientSocket = INVALID_SOCKET;
00031 static UT_message_queue_t _inQueue;
00032 static UT_message_queue_t _outQueue;
00033 static void* _combineBuffer = 0;

00059 //----------------------------------------------------------
00060 bool UTClientConnect( const char* address, unsigned short port )
00061 {
00063         if ( _clientSocket != INVALID_SOCKET )
00064                 return false;
00065 
00067         WORD wsaVer = MAKEWORD( 1, 1 );
00068         if ( WSAStartup( wsaVer, &_wsaData ) != 0 )
00069                 return false;
00070 
00072         _clientSocket = socket( AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP );
00073 
00075         if ( !address || strlen( address ) == 0 || _stricmp( address, "localhost" ) == 0 )
00076                 address = _localhostIP;
00077 
00079         sockaddr_in addr;
00080         if ( isalpha( *address ) )
00081         {
00083                 hostent* host = gethostbyname( address );
00084                 if ( !host )
00085                         return false;
00086 
00088                 UTMakeSockAddr( &addr, *(unsigned long *)host->h_addr_list[0], port );
00089         }
00090         else
00091         {
00093                 UTMakeSockAddr( &addr, inet_addr( address ), port );
00094         }
00095 
00097         if ( connect( _clientSocket, (struct sockaddr *)&addr, sizeof( addr ) ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00098         {
00099                 closesocket( _clientSocket );
00100                 int error = WSAGetLastError();
00101                 error = error;
00102                 return false;
00103         }
00104 
00106 #if UT_ALLOW_LOCAL
00107         bool local = ( strcmp( address, _localhostIP ) == 0 );
00108 #else
00109         bool local = false;
00110 #endif
00111 
00113         char buffer[ UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE ];
00114 
00116 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00117         if ( local )
00118         {
00119                 strcpy_s( buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE, UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_LOCAL );
00120 
00122                 _sendMutex = CreateMutex( NULL, FALSE, UT_CLIENT_MUTEX_NAME );
00123         }
00124         else
00125                 strcpy_s( buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE, UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_REMOTE );
00126 #else
00127         B_ASSERT( strlen( local ? UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_LOCAL : UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_REMOTE ) < UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE - 1 );
00128         strncpy( buffer, local ? UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_LOCAL : UT_HANDSHAKE_CONNECT_REMOTE, UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE );
00129         buffer[ UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE - 1 ] = 0;
00130 #endif
00132         if ( send( _clientSocket, buffer, ( int )strlen( buffer ) + 1, 0 ) == SOCKET_ERROR )
00133         {
00134                 SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00135                 closesocket( _clientSocket );
00136                 int error = WSAGetLastError();
00137                 error = error;
00138                 return false;
00139         }
00140 
00142         if ( local )
00143         {
00146                 int sharedBufNameLength = 0;
00147                 int length = recv( _clientSocket, ( char* )&sharedBufNameLength, sizeof( sharedBufNameLength ), 0 );
00148                 if ( length == SOCKET_ERROR )
00149                 {
00150                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00151                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00152                         return false;
00153                 }
00154 
00156                 char sharedBufName[ UT_HANDSHAKE_BUFFER_SIZE ];
00157                 length = recv( _clientSocket, sharedBufName, sharedBufNameLength, 0 );
00158                 if ( length == SOCKET_ERROR )
00159                 {
00160                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00161                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00162                         return false;
00163                 }
00164 
00166                 _sharedBufferFileMapping = OpenFileMapping( FILE_MAP_READ | FILE_MAP_WRITE, FALSE, sharedBufName );
00167                 if ( _sharedBufferFileMapping == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00168                 {
00169                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00170                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00171                         return false;
00172                 }
00173 
00175                 _sharedBuffer = MapViewOfFile( _sharedBufferFileMapping, FILE_MAP_READ | FILE_MAP_WRITE, 0, 0,
00176                         2 * UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE );
00177                 if ( !_sharedBuffer )
00178                 {
00179                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00180                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00181                         return false;
00182                 }
00183 
00185                 _sendBuffer = ( char* )_sharedBuffer + UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE;
00186                 _recvBuffer = _sharedBuffer;
00187 
00189                 _recvMutex = OpenMutex( SYNCHRONIZE, FALSE, UT_SERVER_MUTEX_NAME );
00190 
00192                 _sendProc = SendLocal;
00193                 _recvProc = RecvLocal;
00194                 _ioctlProc = IoctlLocal;
00195         }
00196         else
00197         {
00199                 memset( buffer, 0, UT_HANDSHAKE_ACCEPT_SIZE );
00200                 int length = recv( _clientSocket, buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_ACCEPT_SIZE, 0 );
00201                 if ( length == SOCKET_ERROR )
00202                 {
00203                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00204                         return false;
00205                 }
00206 
00208                 if ( strcmp( buffer, UT_HANDSHAKE_ACCEPT ) != 0 )
00209                 {
00210                         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00211                         return false;
00212                 }
00213 
00215                 _sendProc = send;
00216                 _recvProc = recv;
00217                 _ioctlProc = ioctlsocket;
00218         }
00219 
00221         if ( !UTSetSocketAsync( _clientSocket, true ) )
00222         {
00223                 if ( local )
00224                 {
00225                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00226                         SafeCloseHandle( _recvMutex );
00227                 }
00228                 closesocket( _clientSocket );
00229                 return false;
00230         }
00231 
00233         if ( !UTSetSocketBuffered( _clientSocket, false ) )
00234         {
00235                 if ( local )
00236                 {
00237                         SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00238                         SafeCloseHandle( _recvMutex );
00239                 }
00240                 closesocket( _clientSocket );
00241                 return false;
00242         }
00243 
00245         UTMessageQueueCreate( &_inQueue, QUEUE_SIZE );
00246         UTMessageQueueCreate( &_outQueue, QUEUE_SIZE );
00247 
00249         _combineBuffer = malloc( SEND_BUFFER_SIZE );
00250 
00252         return true;
00253 }
00254 
00255 //----------------------------------------------------------
00256 bool UTClientDisconnect()
00257 {
00259         free( _combineBuffer );
00260         _combineBuffer = 0;
00261 
00263         if ( _sendMutex )
00264         {
00265                 SafeCloseHandle( _sendMutex );
00266                 SafeCloseHandle( _recvMutex );
00267                 _sendMutex = 0;
00268                 _recvMutex = 0;
00269         }
00270 
00272         if ( _sharedBuffer )
00273         {
00275                 UnmapViewOfFile( _sharedBuffer );
00276                 SafeCloseHandle( _sharedBufferFileMapping );
00277 
00279                 _sharedBufferFileMapping = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
00280                 _sharedBuffer = 0;
00281         }
00282 
00284         if ( _clientSocket == INVALID_SOCKET )
00285                 return false;
00286 
00287         UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_inQueue );
00288         UTMessageQueueDestroy( &_outQueue );
00289 
00291         closesocket( _clientSocket );
00292 
00294         _clientSocket = INVALID_SOCKET;
00295 
00297         WSACleanup();
00298 
00300         return true;
00301 }

00303 //----------------------------------------------------------
00304 UT_message_t* UTClientQueueOutgoing()
00305 {
00307         return UTMessageQueueAdd( &_outQueue );
00308 }

00310 //----------------------------------------------------------
00311 UT_message_t* UTClientRemoveIncoming()
00312 {
00314         UT_message_t* message = UTMessageQueuePeek( &_inQueue );
00315         if ( message && UTMessageReady( message ) )
00316         {
00318                 return UTMessageQueueRemove( &_inQueue );
00319         }
00320 
00322         return 0;
00323 }
00324 
00325 //----------------------------------------------------------

00327 {
00328         return UTMessageQueueCount( &_outQueue );
00329 }

00331 //----------------------------------------------------------
00332 size_t UTClientIncomingCount()
00333 {
00334         return UTMessageQueueCount( &_inQueue );

00337 //----------------------------------------------------------
00338 bool UTSyncToResponse( unsigned int transactionId, unsigned int timeToWait )
00339 {
00340         unsigned int startTime = timeGetTime();
00341 
00343         UT_message_t* top = 0;
00344         while ( !top || top->transactionId < transactionId )
00345         {
00348                 if ( UTMessageQueueFull( &_inQueue ) )
00349                         return false;
00350 
00352                 UTClientUpdateQueues();
00353 
00355                 top = UTMessageQueueTop( &_inQueue );
00356 
00358                 unsigned int timeRunning = timeGetTime() - startTime;
00359                 if ( timeRunning >= timeToWait )
00360                         return false;
00361         }
00362 
00364         return true;
00365 }
00366 
00367 //----------------------------------------------------------
00368 void UTClientUpdateQueues()
00369 {
00371         UTMessageQueueSend( _clientSocket, &_outQueue, ( char* )_combineBuffer,
00372                 SEND_BUFFER_SIZE, 0, _sendProc );
00373 
00375         UTMessageQueueRecv( &_inQueue, _clientSocket, 0, _recvProc, _ioctlProc );
00376 }

00378 //----------------------------------------------------------
00379 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
00380 int __stdcall
00381 SendLocal( SOCKET s, const char* buf, int len, int flags )
00382 {
00383         WaitForSingleObject( _sendMutex, INFINITE );
00384 
00386         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ];
00387         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 1 ];
00388 
00390         if ( readAddr == writeAddr )
00391         {
00392                 ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ] = writeAddr = 0;
00393                 ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 1 ] = readAddr = 0;
00394         }
00395 
00397         unsigned int spaceRemaining = UT_LOCAL_MEMORY_SIZE - writeAddr - 8;
00398         len = Min( ( int )spaceRemaining, len );
00399 
00401         char* dst = ( char* )_sendBuffer + 8;
00402         MemCopy( dst + writeAddr, buf, len );
00403 
00405         ( ( unsigned int* )_sendBuffer )[ 0 ] += len;
00406 
00408         ReleaseMutex( _sendMutex );
00409         return len;
00410 }
00411 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
00412 
00413 //----------------------------------------------------------
00414 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
00415 int __stdcall
00416 RecvLocal( SOCKET s, char* buf, int len, int flags )
00417 {
00418         WaitForSingleObject( _recvMutex, INFINITE );
00419 
00421         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 0 ];
00422         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ];
00423 
00425         unsigned int available = writeAddr - readAddr;
00426         len = Min( ( int )available, len );
00427 
00429         const char* src = ( const char* )_recvBuffer + 8;
00430         MemCopy( buf, src + readAddr, len );
00431 
00433         ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ] += len;
00434 
00436         ReleaseMutex( _recvMutex );
00437         return len;
00438 }
00439 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
00440 
00441 //----------------------------------------------------------
00442 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )
00443 int __stdcall
00444 IoctlLocal( SOCKET s, long cmd, unsigned long* argp )
00445 {
00446         WaitForSingleObject( _recvMutex, INFINITE );
00447 
00449         unsigned int writeAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 0 ];
00450         unsigned int readAddr = ( ( unsigned int* )_recvBuffer )[ 1 ];
00451 
00453         *argp = writeAddr - readAddr;
00454 
00456         ReleaseMutex( _recvMutex );
00457         return 0;
00458 }
00459 #pragma warning( default : 4100 )
